item.description:
This month, it will be a potluck brunch on the deck of Don and Sharon's new home in Hebron. Those of us who have been to the new house, know that this was a deck made for a party! And the view may be even better than at Rose's!

You MUST RSVP by noon on Friday -- maybe's don't count.

Because it is at a private home, you must RSVP inorder to receive directions.


** $5 to cover food costs. **
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be around back on the deck!
item.name: Brunch on the Deck, Take II
